DOC.brief_summary: A randomized placebo controlled trial evaluating the effect of the recently recommended high doses of cholecalciferol (3000 IU/day) on mineral metabolism, blood pressure and pulse wave analysis in healthy individuals.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Vitamin D on Mineral Metabolism, Blood Pressure and Pulse Wave Analysis in Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: > 18 years old p 25OH vitaminD<50nmol/l signed informed consent receiving antihypertensive or antidiabetic treatment sarcoidoses history of kidney stones receiving 1alfahydroxylated vitamin D treatment plasma creatinin > 120 micromol/l ionised calcium > 1,5 mmol/l treatment with calcimimetics active malignancy intestinal malabsorption active pancreatitis former hospitalisation due to alcoholic related disease using euphoriant drugs pregnancy or risk of being pregnant or lactating women Known allergy to cholecalciferol capsules
